article: Rose has four cousins . They are Ann , Betty , Peter and Bill . Pose is the oldest of them . Betty is thirteen years old . She is two years younger than Pose and one year older than Peter . Bill is nine . Ann , the youngest is seven . Betty and Peter are good at running . But Peter runs faster . Pose and Ann like to play basketball . Rose plays better than Ann . Bill is the best singer of them five . Rose an Betty study in a middle school . Ann , Peter and Bill study in a primary school . These five children all work hard at their lessons . But Betty works the hardest .
